1422890.name: The Perfect Shape Demo
1422890.description:
A short demo for everyone to get a sense of how the game plays and a tiny scratch of what is to be expected in the game. It is merely a preview of what could be in the full game showing a few of the possible game routes.

Key features

Level challenge system preview where you can take on from the very beginning a higher difficulty short stage.
Evolution system to upgrade the style you love the most
Power ups to boost you stats temporary
1 mini-boss to test your skill against and amuse yourself while at it
1422890.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
